mapper.delete: delete from project where project_id = #{projectId} and company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into project (company_id, project_name, project_url, online_time) values (#{companyId},#{projectName},#{projectUrl},#{onlineTime})
mapper.select: select count(*) from project where company_id = #{companyId};

select count(*) from project where 1=1
and company_id like '%${companyId}%'
and project_id like '%${projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${projectName}%'
and project_url like '%${projectUrl}%'
and online_time like '%${onlineTime}%'

select company_id, project_id, project_name, project_url, online_time from project where 1=1
and company_id like '%${key.companyId}%'
and project_id like '%${key.projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${key.projectName}%'
and project_url like '%${key.projectUrl}%'
and online_time like '%${key.onlineTime}%'
limit #{offset},#{size}
